summary: The diff implements both REQ-11 and REQ-12. GalleryView.tsx is redesigned as a vertical stack of white rounded cards with bold step headings, description text, and full-width stage images. HowItWorks.tsx is redesigned with the same card-per-step layout on a light cream background. Both changes align with the acceptance criteria. No files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui/ were modified.
